Package ibo1.Protocol

Class ProtocolObject

java.lang.Object
ibo1.Protocol.ProtocolObject
public class ProtocolObject extends Object
ProtocolObject - Represents the core structure of the protocol

0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
